name: Duke of Defense - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The soundtrack for Duke of Defense! Enjoy over 60 minutes of awesome with a huge variety of musical flavor. Ya like chiptune music? We've got that. Funky bass lines? Check! Explosive electric guitar solos? You better believe it!

Relive the adrenaline of Duke of Defense's action packed adventure!

Track List

  • The Duke of Defense - 1:58
  • Generations - 2:16
  • Indigo - 2:12
  • Infinite Sunset - 3:44
  • Grassy Groove - 3:01
  • Dirty Gurdy - 2:25
  • Morning Dew - 2:47
  • Villagers Way - 0:14
  • Old Duke - 0:52
  • Fire Wizard - 1:52
  • Fire Wizard Omega - 1:57
  • Journey On - 0:40
  • Black Ice - 2:14
  • Sn0w - 2:47
  • Lost in the Storm - 3:03
  • Frozen Hooves - 2:25
  • Shiver Shiver - 1:59
  • Phil - 0:29
  • Ice Wizard - 2:41
  • Ice Wizard Omega - 2:45
  • NegaCutscene - 0:35
  • Close to the Soil - 3:10
  • Cape - 2:15
  • Sandstone Dreams - 2:19
  • Sand in Your Boots - 2:25
  • Valley of the Void - 2:43
  • Rally the Troops - 1:43
  • Rally the Toops Finale - 0:05
  • Void Wizard - 3:13
  • Void Wizard Omega - 3:13
  • Generations to Come - 2:11
  • Kingdom Peace - 2:18
  • [BONUS] The Duke of Metal - 2:03

File Formats

We've included all the tracks in WAV and OGG format.

Where to find the tracks?

You'll be able to find the soundtrack inside of your Duke of Defense game directory. The whole soundtrack can be located in a folder called soundtrack.

short_description: The soundtrack for Duke of Defense! Enjoy over 60 minutes of awesome with a huge variety of musical flavor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP/Vista/Windows 7, 8 & 10
  • Processor: Dual-core processor (Intel Dual Core 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 5200+ 2.6 GHz)
  • Graphics: Any
  • Sound Card: One that can play sound
